title: Who really played the guitar for the famous scene in the movie: Cross roads in regard to Paganini's 5th Caprice? - Quora

response.answer_text: The blues stuff is Arlen Roth, the electric shred stuff is Steve Vai (the Devil’s guitarist) and the real classical at the beginning is Bill Kanegiser. 'Crossroads' and Its Unsung Guitar Hero, Arlen Roth
